channel.title: Comments on: Unceremoniuosly ousted INXS replacement frontman homeless, penniless

item.title: By: CRAIG MERRIMAN
item.dc:creator: CRAIG MERRIMAN
item.description: Eric - what's with the vitriol? INXS - a very talented band that has had their careers shunted by 2 selfish lead singers. This may come as a suprise to you but even with JD, they were still able to pull a crowd of 60,000 at a gig and 'switch' was as good as anything they'd produced before. Their show was brilliant and I can't knock them for their creativity. I hope they give JD another go because they still have it - and you might want to deal with the chip on your shoulder, you moron.
item.content:encoded:
Eric – what’s with the vitriol? INXS – a very talented band that has had their careers shunted by 2 selfish lead singers. This may come as a suprise to you but even with JD, they were still able to pull a crowd of 60,000 at a gig and ‘switch’ was as good as anything they’d produced before. Their show was brilliant and I can’t knock them for their creativity.
I hope they give JD another go because they still have it – and you might want to deal with the chip on your shoulder, you moron.
